name: tm05
effect: Teaches Roar to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Roar to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen I: Mega Kick)

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
A savage roar that
makes the foe flee 
to end the battle.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
A savage roar that
makes the foe flee 
to end the battle.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
The foe is made to
switch out with an
ally. In the wild,
the battle ends.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
The foe is scared off, to be replaced
by another Pokémon in its party.
In the wild, the battle ends.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
The foe is scared off, to be replaced
by another Pokémon in its party.
In the wild, the battle ends.
flavor_text_entries.heartgold-soulsilver:
The foe is scared off, to be replaced
by another Pokémon in its party.
In the wild, the battle ends.
flavor_text_entries.black-white:
The target is scared off and replaced
by another Pokémon in its party.
In the wild, the battle ends.
flavor_text_entries.black-2-white-2:
The target is scared off and replaced
by another Pokémon in its party.
In the wild, the battle ends.
flavor_text_entries.x-y:
The target is scared off and a different
Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild,
this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.
flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
The target is scared off, and a different Pokémon is
dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against
a single Pokémon.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
The target is scared off, and a different Pokémon is
dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against
a single Pokémon.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The user goes to sleep for two turns. This fully restores
the user’s HP and heals any status conditions.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
The target is punched with an electrified fist.
This may also leave the target with paralysis.
